name: SeaWar
description:
Sea War is an shoot them up arcade game,  and your goal is to score as many points as possible shooting your enemies,  and avoiding the krakens.

So crack your fingers and prepare to sail !!!

_______________________________________________________

Controls and Rules

W/A/S/D/  OR  left/right/up/down  Arrow keys to Move

Space to shoot

Esc to pause the game 

_______________________________________________________

Tools used
- Unity 2020
- Aseprite 
- Audacity 

_______________________________________________________

The game was made by a team of two coders  , 

Vitor Batista(https://shadomal.itch.io/,       https://github.com/shadomal) ,  

Caio Hudson(https://mckinley-64.itch.io/,           https://github.com/McKinley-TheProProgrammer)

 and one artist  me , Luiza Cerizza (https://www.instagram.com/luiza_cerizza/) . To enter the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2.

GitHub link:  https://github.com/shadomal/boat-game
